title: Sawbones

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose one member of the Mafia to heal each night (4 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Healing a member of the Mafia acts exactly like a Doctor heal.
- You may heal yourself.

desc:
Post 653
*Joining an organized crime syndicate is one way to get your student loans paid off.*
